text:
My studies choice:
First of all, i want to say that i know what i want to do, only since 6 month.
When I was younger i wanted to be an architect. So, during my 3e school year, I did a week in an architect room. After this week, i decided that i wouldn't be an architect. I really don't like the athmosphere of being behind a desk and a computer and just imagine all day long how house can be. I can't do the same thing along the day. But being an architect was my only idea, so after this deception, i was really lost. I asked myself if i want to be a teacher like my parents. Then,  I realise that i really like children but i don't want to work with. So i did a focus on myself and on what did I like ? I did a list. Then, I asked myself if I saw me doing this all my life. Many option was NO. But one idea was a ''Maybe''. Maybe i want to organise some event all my life. Effectively, sice a long time, i really like to organise some spectacle, some birthday, help to organise wedding...
And now I'm here, in Info-com, and I hope that later, i can do what i like to do.
